snippet.title: BLACKTAIL – 'The Forest Awaits' Gameplay Trailer | THE PARASIGHT
snippet.description:
🏹 Discover: https://store.focus-entmt.com/w/BLACKTAILgames?utm_campaign=BT_PreOrderBoost&utm_medium=description&utm_source=YouTube

Pre-order now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1532690/BLACKTAIL/?utm_campaign=BT_PreOrderBoost&utm_medium=description&utm_source=YouTube

Forge the legend of Baba Yaga

Live out the origins of the classic Slavic folks story in BLACKTAIL, and experience a one-of-a-kind blend of intense archery combat, magic and dark storytelling in a vibrant fairy-tale world.

You play as Yaga, a 16-year-old girl accused of witchcraft and expelled from her medieval settlement following the mysterious disappearance of your twin sister and life-long protector Zora. When living memories of your past return as foul, walking spirits, you are left with no other option than to hunt them down in hopes of unraveling your own mystery. Track them down with your trusty bow. Craft arrows, potions and gather materials to survive in the ominous woods. Engage in thrilling fights against mighty bosses as you unearth hidden treasures and collect lost recipes to improve your abilities and shape your playstyle.

Most of all, witness the impact of your decisions on yourself and the world through BLACKTAIL’s Morality system. The fate of the woods is in your hands, so will you be the good, or the evil witch?

BLACKTAIL releases December 15 on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S and PC. Pre-orders are open on Steam. For more information, visit the Focus Entertainment website.
